properties.name: Main Pool
properties.desc_tr: Ana havuz sadece yetişkinler girebilir. Havuz kenarında bulunan Fanstasia Pool bardan rahatlıkla alkollü yada alkolsüz tüm içkiler servis edilmektedir.
properties.desc_en: The main pool is for adults only. All alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks are readily served from the Fanstasia Pool bar located by the pool.
properties.desc_ru: Основной бассейн только для взрослых. В баре Fanstasia Pool, расположенном у бассейна, легко подают все алкогольные и безалкогольные напитки.
